statements: SELECT * FROM cross_org_data_sharing WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT organization_id, data FROM cross_org_data_sharing WHERE organization_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM cross_org_data_sharing WHERE data ->> 'key' = 'value';
SELECT organization_id, contract_id FROM cross_org_data_sharing WHERE organization_id = 3 ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT organization_id, contract_id FROM cross_org_data_sharing WHERE organization_id = 4 LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cross_org_data_sharing WHERE organization_id = 1 ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM cross_org_data_sharing GROUP BY organization_id;
SELECT * FROM cross_org_data_sharing WHERE data->>'key' = 'value';
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM cross_org_data_sharing GROUP BY organization_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT organization_id, MAX(contract_id) AS max_contract_id FROM cross_org_data_sharing GROUP BY organization_id;
SELECT * FROM Organization;
SELECT org_id, org_name FROM Organization WHERE org_type = 'Tech';
SELECT org_id, org_name, org_size FROM Organization ORDER BY org_size DESC;
SELECT contract_name FROM SmartContract WHERE org_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SmartContract JOIN Organization ON SmartContract.org_id = Organization.org_id;
SELECT * FROM Organization WHERE org_id = 1;
SELECT org_name, org_type FROM Organization WHERE org_size > 100;
SELECT contract_name, org_name FROM SmartContract JOIN Organization ON SmartContract.org_id = Organization.org_id;
SELECT org_id, org_name, COUNT(contract_id) as contract_count FROM SmartContract GROUP BY org_id;
SELECT * FROM Organization ORDER BY org_name DESC, org_size ASC;
SELECT contract_name, organization_id FROM SmartContracts;
SELECT * FROM Organizations WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT organization_name, location FROM Organizations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_details FROM SmartContracts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DataSharing WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, contract_details FROM SmartContracts WHERE id = 2;
SELECT organization_name, industry FROM Organizations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM DataSharing;
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts JOIN Organizations ON SmartContracts.organization_id = Organizations.id;
SELECT * FROM Organization;
SELECT org_name, org_description FROM Organization WHERE org_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_name, email FROM User ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_amount FROM Contract WHERE contract_amount > 1000;
SELECT permission_type FROM SharePermission WHERE org_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT org_name, org_description FROM Organization WHERE org_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_name, email FROM User ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_amount FROM Contract WHERE org_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT permission_type FROM SharePermission WHERE org_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY permission_type ASC;

SELECT org_name, user_name, contract_name, permission_type FROM Organization JOIN User ON Organization.org_id = User.org_id JOIN Contract ON User.user_id = Contract.user_id JOIN SharePermission ON Contract.contract_id = SharePermission.contract_id WHERE Organization.org_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM organization;
SELECT org_name, org_id FROM organization ORDER BY org_id DESC;
SELECT contract_name, org_id FROM smart_contract WHERE org_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, access_time, access_type FROM access_logs WHERE access_type = 'READ' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT data_name, data_id FROM data_shared WHERE contract_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM organization;
SELECT org_name FROM organization ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT org_id, org_name FROM organization WHERE org_id = 1;
SELECT data_name, access_time FROM data_shared JOIN access_logs ON data_shared.data_id = access_logs.access_id;
SELECT contract_name, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM smart_contract JOIN data_access ON smart_contract.contract_id = data_access.contract_id GROUP BY contract_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
